description: The Special Deal Archetype - Essential properties that define a special deal
title: Special Deal Schema

___updated.description: Date and time this archetype record was updated in ISO 8601 date standard e.g. YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD

___seller_profile.description: URL to seller or organization's website

___subcategory.description: Specific category of the product, e.g. Skydiving

___tags.description: Array of Tag Archetypes that are used to help categorize this Archetype record

___quantity.description: Specific amount of times special deal can be used in total

___initial_price.description: Initial product price (before deal) in cents as an integer (whole number)

___created.description: Date and time this archetype record was created in ISO 8601 date standard e.g. YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD

___draft.description: Indicates this archetype record is a draft and is not published

___price.description: Product price in cents as an integer (whole number)

___primary_image_archetype.description: Image Archetype ID to use as the primary image of this special deal

____id.description: Unique identifier for this archetype record

___category.description: General category of the product, e.g. Recreation

___seller.description: The person or organization selling the product

___expiration_date.description: Date and time of expiration in ISO 8601 date standard e.g. YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD
